fields.name: DisplayToolTip
fields.fieldText: Using the options below, specify which users are allowed to submit the initial request for approval.

fields.name: ErrorMessage
fields.fieldText: No Case Plans are defined. Please create one.

fields.name: dispErrorGetPicklist
fields.fieldText: Failure trying to retrieve picklist values One common reason for this is that the Object and Field names provided to the Get Picklist Values Flow Action have not been spelled properly. Make sure all custom objects and fields include the "__c" suffix.

fields.name: ErrorMessageNoID
fields.fieldText: Please select a record from the table.

fields.name: ErrorNoItemSelected
fields.fieldText: Their is not item selected please select one value from the list.

fields.name: SimilarCasePlanMessage
fields.fieldText: An approval process already exists with this name.

fields.name: dispErrorSelectedSubmitter
fields.fieldText: You must select at least one submitter

fields.name: SimilarCasePlanWhenUpdate
fields.fieldText: A Case Plan already exists with this name.
